item.title: An improvement and generalization of Rotfel'd type inequalities for sectorial matrices
item.description: arXiv:2404.12849v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: Byusing equivalence conditions for sectorial matrices obtained by Alakhrass and Sababheh in 2020, we improve a Rotfel'd type inequality for sectorial matrices derived by P. Zhang in 2015 and generalize a result derived by Y. Mao et al. in 2024.
item.dc:creator: Nan Fanghong, Teng Zhang
